channel.title: No-Name Project[Phoenix]
channel.description:
[b]Hello![/b] Let's make it quick:
I became in love with [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=657971.0]Phoenix framework[/url] by [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=663427]Vix[/url]. So without any in-depth description, this is a simple side-project that I'm taking on and hopefully bring it up somewhere and somehow. I'll take each detail seriously. I'll be using the same client as my [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,668305.0.html]Avarrocka[/url] project because of it's great data support that I've implemented(with plenty of bugs/improvements). Hopefully It'll go as planned.
Side note: This project is meant for me. I will be writing and updating this thread to keep myself on track. I don't need seek for any support or to showoff anything big.
February 6 2015 [hr] [spoiler] Updated player updating. The original system did support already the basic masks. Yet I wanted to ensure that everything is there(and update them to match my client's)
[ul][li]forced-movement - Left for later.[/li] [li]graphics[url=http://i.imgur.com/ACgJe73.png](pic)[/url][/li] [li]animation[url=http://i.imgur.com/Inxy0pN.png](pic)[/url][/li] [li]forced-chat[url=http://i.imgur.com/ckWGv03.png](pic)[/url][/li] [li]chat[url=http://i.imgur.com/UUCgLvM.png](pic)[/url][/li] [li]face-entity[url=http://i.imgur.com/W8mM5d8.png](pic)[/url][/li] [li]face-direction[url=http://i.imgur.com/RE9Zar3.png](pic)[/url][/li] [li]hit1[url=http://i.imgur.com/s6UwL4B.png](pic)[/url][/li] [li]hit2[url=http://i.imgur.com/hTszOPt.png](pic)[/url][/li] [li]appearance[url=http://i.imgur.com/v0I9n0X.png](pic)[/url][/li][/ul]
[/spoiler]
February 7 2015 [hr] [spoiler] Same as the one above but this time for the npc. Some masks were missing here so I had to add them.
[ul][li]animation[url=http://i.imgur.com/i7WUTbs.png](pic)[/url][/li] [li]graphic[url=http://i.imgur.com/duFZmIr.png](pic)[/url][/li] [li]face-entity[url=http://i.imgur.com/4PuOvWP.png](pic)[/url][/li] [li]face-direction[url=http://i.imgur.com/rjDzfee.png](pic)[/url][/li] [li]forced-chat[url=http://i.imgur.com/ZuxOiup.png](pic)[/url][/li] [li]hit-1[url=http://i.imgur.com/cXcsMzC.png](pic)[/url][/li] [li]hit-2[url=http://i.imgur.com/jOkcgoQ.png](pic)[/url][/li][/ul]
Planned: start a basic combat structure. [/spoiler]
Don't judge this yet, It's all to come.

item.title: No-Name Project[Phoenix]
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

Hello! Let’s make it quick:

I became in love with Phoenix framework by Vix. So without any in-depth description, this is a simple side-project that I’m taking on and hopefully bring it up somewhere and somehow. I’ll take each detail seriously. I’ll be using the same client as my Avarrocka project because of it’s great data support that I’ve implemented(with plenty of bugs/improvements). Hopefully It’ll go as planned.

Side note: This project is meant for me. I will be writing and updating this thread to keep myself on track. I don’t need seek for any support or to showoff anything big.

February 6 2015
[hr]
[spoiler]
Updated player updating. The original system did support already the basic masks. Yet I wanted to ensure that everything is there(and update them to match my client’s)

[ul][li]forced-movement - Left for later.[/li]
[li]graphicsurl=http://i.imgur.com/ACgJe73.png[/url][/li]
[li]animationurl=http://i.imgur.com/Inxy0pN.png[/url][/li]
[li]forced-chaturl=http://i.imgur.com/ckWGv03.png[/url][/li]
[li]chaturl=http://i.imgur.com/UUCgLvM.png[/url][/li]
[li]face-entityurl=http://i.imgur.com/W8mM5d8.png[/url][/li]
[li]face-directionurl=http://i.imgur.com/RE9Zar3.png[/url][/li]
[li]hit1url=http://i.imgur.com/s6UwL4B.png[/url][/li]
[li]hit2url=http://i.imgur.com/hTszOPt.png[/url][/li]
[li]appearanceurl=http://i.imgur.com/v0I9n0X.png[/url][/li][/ul]

[/spoiler]

February 7 2015
[hr]
[spoiler]
Same as the one above but this time for the npc. Some masks were missing here so I had to add them.

[ul][li]animationurl=http://i.imgur.com/i7WUTbs.png[/url][/li]
[li]graphicurl=http://i.imgur.com/duFZmIr.png[/url][/li]
[li]face-entityurl=http://i.imgur.com/4PuOvWP.png[/url][/li]
[li]face-directionurl=http://i.imgur.com/rjDzfee.png[/url][/li]
[li]forced-chaturl=http://i.imgur.com/ZuxOiup.png[/url][/li]
[li]hit-1url=http://i.imgur.com/cXcsMzC.png[/url][/li]
[li]hit-2url=http://i.imgur.com/jOkcgoQ.png[/url][/li][/ul]

Planned: start a basic combat structure.
[/spoiler]

Don’t judge this yet, It’s all to come.

Read full topic
